name: RIOT TIME
description:
This game was made for the Asset Game Jam 4 game jam. All assets that were used, were from the unity asset store. All animations were made by me, OddmanGames. Game has no real purpose or objective, and it was a pain train trying to make it, this game was an overall waste of time. This game was made in one day.

Start Time: 9:14am EST

End Time: 6:11pm EST

Assets used:

Unity Particle Pack

Low Poly Building Lite

Lowpoly Modern City Decorations Set

Fantasy Monster - Skeleton

Stylized Customizable Cars (post apo v1)

Modern Guns: Handgun

WASD - Move
